text: Holy Ghost Church The Corporation of the Church of the Holy Ghost is located in the heart of Federal Hill, Providence, Rhode Island's "Little Italy". The church was established on 22 September 1889, to serve the spirituality of the new Italian immigrants at the turn of the 19th century. The church itself dates from 1909. The architects were Murphy, Hindle & Wright. == References == Category:Churches in Providence, Rhode Island Category:Churches completed in 1909
title: Holy Ghost Church, Providence, Rhode Island
